### Summary table for identified DEGs

```{r fc1, fig.width = 10, fig.height = 6, echo=F}
summary_match = function(summary) {
  arr = unname(sapply(summary, function(x) {str_trim(str_match(x,":(.*)%" )[2])}))
  arr = arr[!is.na(arr)]
  arr = unname(sapply(arr, strsplit, ", "))
  return(arr)
}
summary_list = lapply(result_array, function(x) {capture.output(summary(x, alpha = fdr))})

# summary log for numbers of upregulated and downregulated genes
logs = lapply(summary_list, summary_match)
summary_log = map_dfr(logs, function(x) {data.frame(matrix(unlist(x) %>% as.numeric, nrow=1, byrow=T))})
row.names(summary_log) = names(result_array)
colnames(summary_log) = c("logFC_up", "%logFC", "logFC_down", "%logFC_down", "outliers", "%outliers", "low_counts", "%lowcounts")

DT::datatable(summary_log, 
              rownames = T,
              filter = "top",
              extensions = c("Buttons", "Scroller"),
              style="bootstrap", 
              class="compact  stripe", 
              width="100%",
              options = list(
                dom = "Blrtip",  # specify content (search box, etc)
                deferRender = FALSE,
                scrollY = 600,
                scroller = TRUE, 
                buttons = list(
                  I("colvis"),
                  "csv",  # download as .csv
                  "excel"  # download as .xlsx
                )))
```
